ie.gmit.dip

Class BookParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.dip.WordEntry
      • ie.gmit.dip.BookParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wordable

    public class BookParser
extends WordEntry
    Version:
    1.0 BookParser Class used to read in the .txt file so that the the new Index dictionary can be built on the fly. The Class also contains methods searchWord() and downloadFile(), each used to preform seperate tasks.
    Author:
    Hugh Moran

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookParser() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bookParser(java.lang.String book) 
      void downloadFile()
      The method used to download the wordIndex map that was created with the words from the selected book.
      void searchWord()
      The method allows the user to pass a word to the Iterator so that is can be found and definition with the page numbers it apperars on

      • Methods inherited from class ie.gmit.dip.WordEntry

        addIndex, getDefinition, getIndices, setDefinition

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

      • bookParser

        public void bookParser(java.lang.String book)
        Parameters:
        book - Reads in the parameter of a book from the SearchMenu so that any book can be read into the method.

      • searchWord

        public void searchWord()
        The method allows the user to pass a word to the Iterator so that is can be found and definition with the page numbers it apperars on

      • downloadFile

        public void downloadFile()
        The method used to download the wordIndex map that was created with the words from the selected book.
